caption.title: Seasonal distribution of influenza in Guangzhou from May 2008 to April 2011.
caption.p: (A) Confirmed cases of seasonal influenza (Seasonal, including H1N1, H3N2 and B) and pH1N1 influenza are shown in the indicated time. (B) Confirmed cases of seasonal influenza caused by subtypes H1N1, H3N2 and B are shown in the indicated time.
